attributes.action: Openly Audit the European Unions Accounts to ensure there is no corruption
attributes.background: For clarity and to ensure there is no corruption, financial misgivings or illegal activities within the European Union's financial dealings, an open audit would benefit the people whose taxes pay into the coffers of the European Union, its financial institutions or their representatives.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the European Court of Auditors and not the UK Government or Parliament.

The European Court of Auditors audits the revenue and expenditure of the EU budget every year.

You can find out more about the ECA here:

https://www.eca.europa.eu/en/Pages/ecadefault.aspx
